Welcome to pypyt's documentation!
*********************************

Pypyt is a library to render PowerPoint presentations from python in
an easy and intuitive way.


How to Install it
=================

   pip install pypyt


How to use it
=============

   from pypyt import *
   values = {'presentation_title': "My Cool Presentation"}
   render_and_save_ppt('__template__.pptx', values, 'presentation.pptx')

For more information about how to use this library, see the API
Documentation.
